Text: Considering this is 2 GB I was expecting a much better quality. Picture is really grainy, definition is really poor.
Never mind picture quality, I stopped watching after 20 minutes. Here's all I'll remember about this show: blah-blah blah-blah blah-blah ...

Yeah, you have to actually be able to follow a dialogue to enjoy this show. But hey, if you have a bit of a brain, this is one of the most incredible new shows of the year. Aaron Sorkin, from the earlier seasons of the west wing, is back.
The Grain Leto mentions is just noise from the low light sequence in the beginning! The quality of the video is awesome!
